summary: Provides a comprehensive suite of unit tests for the SeamlessM4T v2 model when processing text inputs, covering configuration validation, model initialization, forward‑pass signatures, handling of large decoder past states, pretrained loading, weight reloading without missing ties, fast‑initialization save/load cycles, and various gradient‑checkpointing settings during training.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, stability, and performance of the SeamlessM4T v2 text‑input model across different usage scenarios, enabling reliable integration and deployment in production systems.
